TEXT.TITLE: HOUSTON OIL TRUST <HO> HALTS ROYALTIES
TEXT.BODY: Houston Oil Trust said there will be no royalty funds available for distribution to unit holders in April. It also said that based on recent independent petroleum engineers' estimates of Oct 31, 1986, there may be no amounts avialable for distribution the rest of the year. Reuter
